item.title: Gotcha when importing client certificates for Azure P2S VPN
item.description: After waiting 30 minutes for my P2S VPN gateway to deploy in Azure I was obviously eager to get VPN-ing, who wouldn't be! I ran through the instructions to generate a self-signed Root Cert and a client cert from Microsoft on this page [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/vpn-gateway/vpn-gateway-certificates-point-to-site](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/vpn-gateway/vpn-gateway-certificates-point-to-site) \*(Put a pin here, we'll come back to this) I'd imported the certs to my test client VM and the Client VPN setup exe ran ok and created a connection in "
